title: Looking for Fun group/Community to play with
body:
Hello I have been with out a computer for 8 months but will have my last part for my new one very soon so looking for a group / community that is active, mature and fun. I don't really care what rank y'all are but it would be fun to have some high ranks but again don't really care. I was plat last season, I was a Shaco main mostly AP and I'm really chill but a little shy lol.

My last part should be here on the 29th so yeah. Either leave a reply here or link a discord or whatever you use.

replies.body: Hey guy, I sent you an add in game.

> [{quoted}](name=MadCast Epic,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=f6RZeP32,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-27T04:52:04.358+0000)
>
> Hey guy, I sent you an add in game.

I won't see it till I get my computer. On phone right now

> [{quoted}](name=Shadow Listic,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=f6RZeP32,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-27T05:00:16.546+0000)
>
> I won't see it till I get my computer. On phone right now

All good dude, we'll talk then.

https://discord.gg/S34SVP7    , community of  ~60 of us on a discord channel that plays friendly custom games on the weekends between 4 different teams. We call them Faction battles, very accepting server if you wanna try it out. Ive had a lot of fun with my team
